title: Diane Ravitch On The State Of Public Education
teaser: Former Assistant Secretary of Education, Diane Ravitch, joins Kathleen for a discussion on the future of public education. Common Core, Charter Schools, Vouchers, Funding, Teachers are all on the table for this conversation. Diane is Professor of Education at NYU and an education historian.
